relation.translate: отношение, связь, соотношение, зависимость, родственник, родство, родственница
examples: Steve is a distant relation of my wife.
What relation are you to Jessica?
We have relations in Canada and Scotland.
The incident led to tense international relations.
Relations between the two countries have improved recently.
I am thus particular in the relation of every incident.
The title of the essay bore little relation to the contents.
He was the hero according to his own relation.
The things she says bear little relation to what she actually does.
the price curve in relation to inflation
Canada and Britain have established diplomatic relations with North Korea.
The price the meat is sold for bears no relation to (=is not connected to) the price the farmer receives.
He has distant relations back in New Jersey.
Relations between workers and management are generally good.
Women's earnings are still low in relation to men's.
The union has close relations with the Labour Party.
How do their sales stand in relation to those of similar firms?
Britain threatened to break off diplomatic relations with the regime.
If there were a direct relation between mendacity and the length of one's proboscis, hers would be a mile long.

Если верить его собственным рассказам, он был героем.
То, что она говорит, имеет слабое отношение к тому, что она, собственно, делает.
